General.Name: PHA Co. Ltd
General.Description: PHA Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive door moving systems in South Korea and internationally. Its product portfolio includes latching systems, hinges, door products, and pctsower systems, as well as other products, such as endgate handles, touch pad switches, fuel filler openers, injection parts, and stamping parts. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea. PHA Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of PHC CO,.LTD.
